chatParticipants.name: hello

languageModelTools.name: hello-chat-participant_get_time
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Gets the current date and time. Use this tool when the user asks what time it is, what the current date is, or anything related to the current time.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Get the current date and time

languageModelTools.name: hello-chat-participant_github_clone
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Clones a GitHub repository to the local workspace. Use this tool when the user wants to download, clone, or get source code from a GitHub repository. The user should provide the repository in 'owner/repo' format (e.g., 'microsoft/vscode'). Optionally accepts a branch name.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Clone a GitHub repository to your workspace

repoName.description: The GitHub repository to clone in 'owner/repo' format (e.g., 'microsoft/vscode')

branch.description: Optional branch name to clone. If not specified, the default branch will be used.

targetFolder.description: Optional folder name to clone into. If not specified, the repository name will be used.

languageModelTools.name: hello-chat-participant_open_browser
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Opens Chrome browser and navigates to the specified URL. Use this tool when the user wants to open a website or URL in a browser.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Open a URL in Chrome browser

url.description: The URL to open in the browser (e.g., 'https://google.com')
